8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"When the Messenger of Allah performed I'tikaf, he would bring his head near me so I could comb it, and he would not enter the house except for some personal needs

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُعْتَكِفُ يَخْرُجُ لِحَاجَتِهِ أَمْ لاَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: Can The One Performing I'tikaf Leave For His Needs Or Not?
